rows.label: qst702408_msg0002
rows.name:
How is it? The garden's been kept
clean since then, right? This is the
result of my dad's and my work.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0003
rows.name:
To be honest... I never
had any special feelings
for this garden before.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0004
rows.name:
But seeing my dad work so hard
to repair the messed-up garden
up close, I thought...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0005
rows.name:
I won't be satisfied until
I give that Heaven's Holy
Grail a good punch!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0006
rows.name:
What? In that case, would
I be interested in joining
the resistance...?

rows.label: qst702408_msg0007
rows.name:
Hmm... It's a request from
none other than you all.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0008
rows.name:
I want to repay the favor, and
honestly, I want to give that
Heaven's Holy Grail a piece of my mind.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0009
rows.name:
But right now, this gardener
job is also important to me...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0010
rows.name:
...Wait a minute. Does that
mean I have to convince that
stubborn old man first?!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0011
rows.name: Ugh! This is going to be tough!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0012
rows.name:
Sorry, but could you
give me a little time?

rows.label: qst702408_msg0013
rows.name:
If I make up my mind and can
convince that stubborn old man,
I'll go to the resistance camp.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0101
rows.name:
It's a man's duty to repay the
favors he's received, after all...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0102
rows.name:
But if I tell that stubborn old man
that I want to quit being a gardener
and join the resistance...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm sure it won't end with
just a punch or two...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0104
rows.name:
But I'll give you a proper
answer! Could you give me
a little more time?
